item.title: Apple Shortcuts
item.description: Apple Shortcuts Variables Magic Variables Set variable Ask for value Data types Dictionaries Dictionaries are like [[Javascipt Maps]] in which we have a displayable keys and values attached to those keys

item.title: iOS | Map Of Content
item.description: Porqué? Lo que aprendas para desarrollar en IOS, no solo te servirá para desarrollo mobil; también te servirá para desarrollar en todo el [[Apple Ecosystem]] (Watch, iPad, Mac, iPhone)

item.title: My IPhone Configuration
item.description: My IPhone Configuration Night Shift 19:00 -> 6:00 Notifications Block via No disturb focus mode And disable most of the apps that doesn’t matter to me Notification Summary I receive a summary of my main applications at the next times:

item.title: Programming on storyboard
item.description: Programming on storyboard Project structure Main.storyboard -> Visual Editor for our code (View) ViewController.switf -> Define the logic for the app (Controller) Launchscreen.

item.title: Swift Cheatsheet
item.description: Swift Cheatsheet This is a [[cheatsheet]] which contains things that are useful but a little tricky to remind Timer 1 timer = Timer.

item.title: XCode
item.description: XCode Create project [!question]+ You locate the folder by right-clicking on the project name (left sidebar) and select ‘show in finder’
